column6: 37176 - Top # Household Cleaning Mistakes To Avoid
column7: 800-1000 Words. List 5-10 different mistakes that people often make when doing home cleaning. Things like not vacuuming the stairs, not cleaning out the microwave, not dusting properly, etc. You can place the client link in a section where you take about cleaning products. You can mention that Amway has a lot of great products for home cleaning. Your target audience is mostly women who are interested in home products.
column16: Example At: companies like Amway have great surface cleaners
